data.name: Wrestledunk Sports
data.detailed_description:
Wrestledunk your friends!



Spike, squish, stab, wrestle and dunk your way to victory in a pack of multiplayer sports games! Get into the super competitive local and online multiplayer action for up to 8 players. Try out the free demo!

  • Try out all the sports, like Fencing, Wrestling and Smashball!
  • Online and local multiplayer for up to 8 players
  • Warm up or round out the teams with AIs for every sport
  • Unlock dozens of arenas and modes
  • Easy to pick up controls, hard to master moves
  • Streamer mode for online play

It's easy to get a match going with Wrestledunk's custom cross-platform rollback netcode.
Can you have 4 local players and face off against 4 others online? Of course!
Someone destroying you at Smashball? Switch up the sports and teams seamlessly!
Not sure? Try out Wrestling and Volleyball in the free demo online with your friends!
Controller recommended.

data.short_description: Wrestledunk is an explosive, colorful collection of super competitive multiplayer sports games! Face off online or locally with up to 8 players. Get into it!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, French*, Italian*, German*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 13.04
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux 13.4 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
